about_the_game:
The Magical Mysteries Original Soundtrack includes 7 tracks in high quality mp3 format, remastered by Daniel Albel.

Track list:

  • Magical Mysteries
  • The Gate of Griffins
  • Battle at the Gate
  • The Basilisk's Cave
  • Mage of Hoar
  • Hall of the Dragon
  • The Witch and the Sorceress
detailed_description:
The Magical Mysteries Original Soundtrack includes 7 tracks in high quality mp3 format, remastered by Daniel Albel.

fullgame.name: Magical Mysteries: Path of the Sorceress

name: Magical Mysteries: Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and above
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP and above
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Magical Mysteries Original Soundtrack includes 7 tracks.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Swedish, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
